mapper.insert: insert into order_tb(orderno, uid, address1, address2, address3, uphone, price, stock, name, state) values (#{orderno}, #{vo.uid}, #{vo.address1}, #{vo.address2}, #{vo.address3}, #{vo.uphone}, #{vo.price},#{stock}, #{vo.name}, #{state})
mapper.select: select * from delivery as d, order_tb as o where d.state = o.state and o.uid=#{uid}
mapper.update: update order_tb set state=#{state} where orderno=#{orderno};
